Shape.description: Window/dialog frame with styles for various platforms

Property.name: title
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'htmlObject', bound: new Bound(5, 5, Math.max($box.w, 80) - 10, 25), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(0, 1), multi: false})

For.Bound: var d = $withShadow.value ? 5 : 0; new Bound(0 - d, 0 - d, $box.w + 2 * d, $box.h + 13 + 2 * d);

Attr.Arg: $style.value == "macosx" ? "-moz-box-sizing: border-box; box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%; height: 100%; border-top: solid 1px #515151; position: relative; top: 0px;" : "width: 100%; height: 100%;"

div.style: -moz-box-sizing: border-box; box-sizing: border-box; position: absolute; top: 5px; left: 5px; right: 105px; height: 17px; line-height: 17px !important; min-height: 0px;

span.style: position: absolute; bottom: -1.5em; margin-left: -2px; line-height: 1em; left: 0em; font: -moz-list; font-size: 10px; opacity: .3; height: 1.2em; overflow: hidden;
